channel.title: Movie Soundtrack scores
channel.description:
Do you like them, what you're favorites? [COLOR='Red'][b] ALSO DON'T BE POSTING NORMAL MOVIE MUSIC THAT WAS IN THE MOVIE, I MEAN MUSIC JUST MADE FOR THAT MOVIE[/b]

item.title: Movie Soundtrack scores
item.dc:creator: shodanbot
item.description:
^ I hate it when music is used to fake emotion from its audience, I mean let the actors act, am I right?

Good tune though.

Read full topic

item.title: Movie Soundtrack scores
item.dc:creator: Frankminimia
item.description:
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=vHAvjaHtlMA&feature=related

from the move Gladiator. This was used at the end of the film, the scene combined with this music was enough to make me cry, It was just so sad but also happy at the same time, this music just toped it off. If you seen the movie you know what i mean, best movie of all time in my opinion.

Edit: agree 28 days later theme is amazing

Read full topic

item.title: Movie Soundtrack scores
item.dc:creator: Imonfire
item.description:
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=KSYYEDXaGo0

Fuckin’ epic.

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=hvmCuosF0Xo

This one for the 8-bit atmosphere

And does Across The Universe count? Because the song we’re not composed for the movie, but they were (greatly) covered for it.

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=I6B2UfHaS_4

Read full topic

item.title: Movie Soundtrack scores
item.dc:creator: Lamsey
item.description:
Siggs:

PotC soundtrack

Just found this, but the orchestral one is just as good
.

This. That whole soundtrack is the woot. I particularly like the Barbossa is Hungry track. It’s great the way he changes the themes about from 3/4 to 4/4 to get different feels.

Read full topic

item.title: Movie Soundtrack scores
item.dc:creator: raw_bean
item.description:
Kudos for the BSG and Children of Dune tracks, Brian Tyler and Bear McCreary kick arse. I might post some choices of my own later.

EDIT: Oh and I love that track from Sunshine, which was highly underrated.

EDIT 2: You’ve got me really in the Bear McCreary/BSG mood, so here’s one of the most stirring pieces of music I’ve ever heard:

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=SlcUwUwjLrs

Read full topic
